<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Retrieve Staking Summary"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/staking/summary/core"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>

Return overall staking information on a given Core address.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"coreAddress","in":"query","required":true,"description":"The core address to retrieve staking information for.","schema":{"type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Staking summary retrieved successfully.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Status code of the response."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Additional information or message about the response."},"data":{"type":"object","properties":{"stakedCoreAmount":{"type":"string","description":"Total amount of CORE staked."},"stakedHashAmount":{"type":"string","description":"Total amount of HASH staked."},"stakedBTCAmount":{"type":"string","description":"Total amount of BTC staked."},"pendingCoreReward":{"type":"string","description":"Pending CORE reward."},"pendingHashReward":{"type":"string","description":"Pending HASH reward."},"pendingBTCReward":{"type":"string","description":"Pending BTC reward."},"claimedCoreReward":{"type":"string","description":"Claimed CORE reward."},"claimedHashReward":{"type":"string","description":"Claimed HASH reward."},"claimedBTCReward":{"type":"string","description":"Claimed BTC reward."}}}}}}}},"400":{"description":"Invalid core address supplied.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"status":{"type":"integer","description":"Status code of the response."},"message":{"type":"string","description":"Error message explaining the issue."}}}}}}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
